name: Sir Barkley the Ascended One
description:
It's come down to this...

Sir Barkley, a once typical dog turned omniscient being, needs your help. The celestial gems, ancient collections of pure power, are descending upon our universe with the intent to destroy everything we know.

Use your own powers to hijack the gems and force them aside so that Barkley might get to their leader and destroy it. Stay for as long as you can, or else...

Self-imposed 8-hour game jam

Credits:

Gabby Delforge - Programming,

Joe Fajnor - All art assets and original soundtrack, 

Kevin Royston - Programming (UI), 

Andy Tu - Programming
